text.2879: [21] tassaapi vacana.m sutvaa, bhiyyo citta.m pasaadayi.m.
text.2885: [21] nagara.m sobhavatii naama, sobho naamaasi khattiyo.
text.2888: [21] braahma.no ^a^P0.0061^ea^ ya~n~nadatto ca, aasi buddhassa  so pitaa.
text.2891: [21] tii.ni ^a^V2.0359^ea^ vassasahassaani, agaara.m ajjha so vasi.
text.2895: [22] rucigattaa naama naarii, satthavaaho naama atrajo..
text.2909: [21] uggo ca somadevo ca, ahesu.m aggupa.t.thakaa.
text.2910: [22] siivalaa ceva saamaa ca, ahesu.m aggupa.t.thikaa..
text.2913: [22] ukkaamukhe yathaa kambu, eva.m ra.msiihi ma.n.dito..
text.2916: [22] taavataa ti.t.thamaano so, taaresi janata.m bahu.m..
text.2939: [21] catumaasa.m yadaa buddho, loke carati caarika.m.
text.2945: [21] sudhammaa devapure ramme, tattha dhamma.m pakittayi.
text.2960: [21] lakkha.ne ^a^T2.0539^ea^ itihaase ca, sadhamme paarami.m gato.
text.2966: [21] aadaaya ^a^V2.0361^ea^ ma.m gha.tiikaaro, upaga~nchi kassapa.m jina.m.
text.2967: [22] tassa dhamma.m su.nitvaana, pabbaji.m tassa santike..
text.2975: [21] mama acchariya.m disvaa, sopi buddho viyaakari.
text.2992: [22] pitaa suddhodano naama, aya.m hessati gotamo..
text.2995: [22] kolito upatisso ca, aggaa hessanti saavakaa.
text.3020: [21] tassaapi vacana.m sutvaa, bhiyyo citta.m pasaadayi.m.
text.3026: [21] nagara.m baaraa.nasii naama, kikii naamaasi khattiyo.
text.3029: [21] braahma.no brahmadattova, aasi buddhassa so pitaa.
text.3032: [21] duve ^a^P0.0064^ea^ vassasahassaani, agaara.m ajjha so  vasi.
text.3036: [22] sunandaa naama saa naarii, vijitaseno naama atrajo..
text.3044: [21] tisso ca bhaaradvaajo ca, ahesu.m aggasaavakaa.
text.3057: [22] taavataa ti.t.thamaano so, taaresi janata.m bahu.m..
text.3063: [22] keci nibbaana.m patthentaa, passantu me ala"nkara.m..
text.3118: [21] idaani ye etarahi, jahanti maanusa.m bhava.m.
text.3124: [21] nagara.m kapilavatthu me, raajaa suddhodano pitaa.
text.3131: [22] bhaddaka~ncanaa naama naarii, raahulo naama atrajo..
text.3139: [21] kolito upatisso ca, dve bhikkhuu aggasaavakaa.
text.3156: [21] taani ca atulatejaani, imaani ca dasabalaani {yasabalaani  (a.t.tha0)}.
text.3166: [22] diipa"nkaro ca sambuddho, ekakappamhi te jinaa..
text.3177: [21] ma"ngalo ca sumano ca, revato sobhito muni.
text.3195: [21] ti.msakappasahassamhi, duve aasu.m vinaayakaa {aasi.msu naayakaa (syaa0  ka0)}.
text.3196: [22] sumedho ca sujaato ca, orato padumuttaraa..
text.3198: [21] a.t.thaarase kappasate, tayo aasu.m vinaayakaa {aasi.msu naayakaa (syaa0  ka0)}.
text.3207: [21] dvenavute ^a^M2.0383^ea^ ito kappe, duve aasu.m vinaayakaa.
text.3208: [22] tisso phusso ca sambuddhaa, asamaa appa.tipuggalaa..
text.3211: [22] sopi buddho kaaru.niko, satte mocesi bandhanaa..
text.3213: [21] ekati.mse ito kappe, duve aasu.m vinaayakaa.
text.3214: [22] sikhii ca vessabhuu ceva, asamaa appa.tipuggalaa..
text.3216: [21] imamhi bhaddake kappe, tayo aasu.m vinaayakaa.
text.3223: [22] aacikkhitvaana ta.m magga.m, nibbutaa te sasaavakaati..
text.3233: [21] eko ca raamagaamamhi, eko ca ve.thadiipake.
text.3234: [22] eko paaveyyake malle, eko ca kosinaarake..
text.3242: [21] u.nhiisa.m catasso daa.thaa, akkhakaa dve ca dhaatuyo.
text.3243: [22] asambhinnaa imaa satta, sesaa bhinnaava dhaatuyo..
text.3246: [22] khuddakaa saasapamattaa ca, naanaava.n.naa ca dhaatuyo..
text.3248: [21] mahantaa suva.n.nava.n.naa ca, muttava.n.naa ca majjhimaa.
text.3251: [21] mahantaa pa~nca naa.liyo, naa.liyo pa~nca majjhimaa.
text.3252: [22] khuddakaa cha naa.lii ceva, etaa sabbaapi dhaatuyo..
text.3254: [21] u.nhiisa.m siiha.le diipe, brahmaloke ca vaamaka.m.
text.3257: [21] ekaa daa.thaa tidasapure, ekaa naagapure ahu.
text.3260: [21] cattaaliisasamaa ^a^T2.0549^ea^ dantaa, kesaa lomaa ca sabbaso.
text.3269: [21] kaasaava.m brahmaloke ca, ve.thana.m tidase pure.
